explanation: [0-0] Two boxes of Tic Tac candies, one green and one orange, appear on the screen. Both boxes are open, with a single candy resting on each lid. They are placed on a grey carpet, with a blurred row of toy cars in the background.
[0-2] A hand pushes a purple remote-controlled toy car into the frame from the right. It stops beside the Tic Tac boxes, then points at the car and the two candies before moving the car away.
[0-2] A hand pushes a purple remote-controlled toy car into the frame from the right. It stops beside the Tic Tac boxes, then points at the car and the two candies before moving the car away.

[2-7] The remote-controlled car then drifts in circles in front of the two candies. With each circle, as the car reaches the front of the candy boxes, its spoiler sweeps the candies off the lids and into the boxes.
